info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:04PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Broadwater and east central Jefferson Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 501 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Boulder, moving east at 15 mph. This storm will move across Montana Highway 69 between Boulder and Caldwell around 520 PM. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail in addition to localized breif heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Radersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
